column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I have been here several times and willingly admit at one time Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba was the best. Recently they have really fallen off the delicious wagon. It is a sad story. This last time I went (which inspired me to write this cautionary tale) the spicy potatoes and flank steak...YUM. The grilled squid
column3: goat cheese in spicy tomato sauce
column5: and the rest of the meal...SUB PAR at best. Stale bread
